settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Amazing Health Benefits
settings.text: There are many benefits to plant-based eating, including reduced risk of heart disease, diabetes, obesity, and some types of cancer. But to reap these benefits, you must eat a well-planned vegetarian diet. Luckily, that’s exactly what Table & Twine’s vegetarian meal kits provide.

settings.title: More “You” Time
settings.text: Time is our most precious commodity. This is why the chefs with Table & Twine are committed to helping you save some. Since they par-cook grains, roast vegetables, and muddle herbs ahead of time, you’ll just need to follow the simple heating instructions.

settings.title: Fresh, Bold Flavors Every Day
settings.text: Whether you’re a lifelong vegetarian or are new to the plant-based world, there’s a near-endless variety of tasty vegetarian ingredients to sample. Vegetarian meal kits are the perfect way to introduce your palate to this healthy and flavorful way of eating.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose a Vegetarian Meal Kit?
settings.text: At Table & Twine, our vegetarian dishes don’t taste like a home-cooked meal. No, they taste even better. Curated by award-winning chefs, our plant-based dishes are indistinguishable from those served in a five-star restaurant. Other reasons why Charlotte residents love our vegetarian meal kits include:

Fresh, Gourmet Flavors: When you choose Table & Twine, you’ll gain access to a rotating menu of artisanal vegetarian dishes. Prepared using authentic techniques and mindfully sourced ingredients, Table & Twine’s offerings highlight local produce as well as flavors from around the world.

Ease & Efficiency: Table & Twine doesn’t just take care of the planning and prep work. Rather, convenience is integrated into everything we do. For example, many of our items are designed to be cooked in their original packaging. This minimizes clean-up.

Flexibility & Adaptability: Table & Twine is anything but one-size-fits-all. Our goal is to provide you with meals that suit your lifestyle. This starts with no minimum portion counts. Whether you want an easy meal for one or are hosting a dinner party, Table & Twine will prepare exactly what you need.

The Personal Touch: Our chefs bring their commitment to creating personalized culinary experiences to every dish. No matter if you’re ordering nutrient-dense toasted rice bowls topped with miso-ginger dressing or festive artisan street tacos, you’ll taste the dedication to quality.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: What To Expect From Our Vegetarian Meal Service
settings.text2: All vegetarian meal kits in Charlotte aren’t created equal. So what makes Table & Twine worth a try? Let’s take a closer look.

settings.title: Are vegetarian meals only for people who don't eat meat?
settings.text: Vegetarian meals are for everyone, even avid carnivores! Table & Twine’s vegetarian meal kits in Charlotte are designed for people who want to improve their health while enjoying tasty, convenient dishes.

settings.title: Can I pick the recipes in my vegetarian meal service?
settings.text: Of course! Our meals are all about providing the perfect combination of sustenance and satisfaction. That’s why we offer a diverse selection of vegetarian options each week. Just check out the rotating menu, pick the meals that whet your appetite, and wait for your vegetarian meal delivery kit to arrive at your door.

settings.title: What will I get in my Table & Twine vegetarian meal kit?
settings.text: Your vegetarian meal kit in Charlotte will include all the delicious, locally-sourced ingredients you need to prepare a restaurant-quality meal in 15 minutes or less.

settings.title: How can I benefit from this vegetarian meal kit?
settings.text: Meal planning can be overwhelming, especially if you’re trying to change how you’re eating. Fortunately, the chefs at Table & Twine will do all the hard stuff for you. From planning to portioning, we labor so you can savor. And we wouldn’t have it any other way.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
